transArray.content: Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! Spending a few days with you has made us a family and established a deep relationship with each other. We look forward to your next stay at the hotel. In addition, the hotel is surrounded by convenient transportation and is within walking distance of Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station. It can be reached in about 15 minutes. The hotel has also added a food delivery robot, a self-service laundry room, and a dryer to provide convenient services for your travel. I wish you a happy life!
